commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: One, two, three, four. One, two, three, four. Your movements are getting dull, guys. Use your whole body.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: O-Okay!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: One, two, three, four. One, two... Yoshiko, you're breathing really hard. You hit your limit already?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: D-Don't be ridiculous. I am only exerting twenty percent of my true capabilities! In fact, I could descend twice-over!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: I get the twenty percent part, but what the heck does descending mean here?

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Well, if this is too easy for you, I'll have to put together a special regimen just for you.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I-If you force me to unleash my full potential, it will spell the end of the world... *Huff* *Wheeze*

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Oh yeah? I'd say Yoshiko would give out before the planet would.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: All right, all right. Enough chit-chat. You're wasting precious stamina.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: All things considered, you are far more into this than usual.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: After hearing that beautiful song, who the heck wouldn't be?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: So it's RIKO'S fault we're suffering like this!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Wh-Why is it my fault?!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Well, the song does get you pretty amped up, that's for sure!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Yup! It's a masterpiece! The kind that only comes around once every century!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Stop! You're just gonna make it harder for me to write any future songs!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: We gotta practice real hard so that we do Riko's song justice!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Yeah, that's the spirit!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: But practicing on the sand like this is so hard!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: We're doing it to help build your stamina up too.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Oh?! Then that means we can get out of running later, right?

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: There's no getting out of that.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Y-You're a monster, zura!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I had a hunch when I saw Chika head off early in the morning that they might be out doing some intensive training. Turns out I was right.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Just 'cause we're by the water doesn't mean they have to act so koi. We could use some schooling too!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I can't believe they're up this early... Most people would still be dead asleep right now.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Kanata's asleep on her feet.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: *Snore*

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: ...That's some talent she has there.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Regardless, Aqours sure is amazing.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Yeah. You can tell how much energy they're putting into their dance moves.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Not to mention doing it all on the sand. Their core strength must be incredible if they can keep from sliding all over the place.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: It looks real tough...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Don't be such a baby, Rinako!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Oh, do you think you can do that, Kasumi?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Hmm... If that's a yes or no question, I'd have to go with...yesno!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: That's not an answer and you know it!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: It's incredible how hard all of Aqours is working. We could really learn a lot from them.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Yeah, it's definitely praiseworthy to be up this early for practice.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: I wanna try doing a synchronized dance like that too!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: That's the sort of dance that only works if everyone is completely in unison, right?

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Yeah. You can't do it unless you understand each other completely. They must trust each other a whole lot.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: They're not just dancing for themselves, but for all of Aqours. You can totally tell just by watching them.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: It just goes to show just how amazing Aqours is.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Just look at them... It'd be a waste not to use this for the promo video. I knew I was right to bring my camera.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: It really is an amazing sight. Just watching them is enough to get me excited too.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: I wanna join in! I wanna practice with everyo...

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Ack, Rin! We're supposed to be hiding right now! Hush!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Aww, whaaat?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: But it is a bit frustrating to watch, too...

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Yeah, seeing them practice is really lighting a fire in my heart!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: To put it simply, none of us want to lose to them.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Yup, we're school idols as well, after all!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: We may all be partners striving for the same goal, but we're also rivals. There's no doubt about that!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: We're not gonna let them get one over on us! Let's get practicing as well!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Yeah!
